practice_phrases: I'd like to read.
我想读。
I'd like to read it.
我想读它。
I'd like to read later.
我想晚点读。
I'd like to read what you need.
我想读你需要什么。
I'd like to read next year.
我想明年读。
I'd like to read when I have time.
我想我有时间的时候读。
I'd like to read, although I don't have time now.
我想读，虽然我现在没有时间。
I'd like to read what you're going to do.
我想读你打算做什么。
I'd like to read if you'll be able to help me understand.
如果你能帮我理解，我想读。
I'd like to read, but I need to help you first.
我想读，但我需要先帮你。
